credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Part of a sheet of a drawing book: figures and architectural plans
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, bistre, on paper
description: A group of two women sitting and a man standing are engaged in conversation. He is attired in according to seventeenth century Dutch fashion. Another man, seated at right, is clothed like a Dutch peasant. At left, is a bird's eye view of a structure in wheel form; a sketch of a part of its plan is above the figures.
name: Drawing
